|brand = LogiLink |model = UA0078 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/18/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/LogiLink UA0078 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 1.1 |if_connector_type = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |form_factor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 0d8c |device_id = 000c |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Baord ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = 10 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |manuf_country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Manufacturer model: "UA0078 - USB Soundcard with Virtual 7.1 Soundeffects"
"ZT-SK01v1.0" is silkscreened on the board.
This is an USB sound card with one microphone input and one headphones output, 3.5mm audio jacks.
The card is detected in Linux as "C-Media USB Headphone Set"
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:logilink-UA0078-top.jpg|casing File:logilink-UA0078-bottom.jpg|casing File:logilink-UA0078-board_top.jpg|board top File:logilink-UA0078-board_bottom.jpg|board bottom </gallery></center[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
